newsitem.title: KENYA: Kenya tea prices firmer at weekly auction.
newsitem.headline: Kenya tea prices firmer at weekly auction.

text.p: Kenyan tea prices were firm at the weekly auction in Mombasa boosted by strong demand, auction officials said on Monday.

Brighter and medium BP1s gained by 7-10 U.S. cents while Brighter PF1s edged up by 5-14 cents. Brighter and medium PDUSTs gained 4-9 cents. Brighter, medium and lower medium DUST1s were up 6-10 cents.
Support from Pakistan and Egypt was strong while Sudan and Somalia were active. Interest from Britain was selective. --Wambui Chege, Nairobi Newsroom ++254-2 330-261.
